data.Name: Griselda
data.Bio: GriseldaxFR or Griselda Records is an American hip hop collective and independent record label based in Buffalo, New York. It was founded by rapper Westside Gunn in 2012. Him, his paternal half-brother Conway the Machine and their cousin Benny the Butcher make up the core of the group. Other members include: Mach-Hommy, Boldy James, Armani Casear, Rome Streetz, YN Billy and in-house producer Daringer. In 2019, the core members released an album titled "WWCD" (What Would Chinegun Do) under the Griselda group name. Read more on Last.fm
